auth.subtitle: Discover Japan's vending machines
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetEmailSent: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}

validation.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

accountCreated.title: Account created!
accountCreated.message: Please check your email to verify your account.

profile.title: Profile
profile.savedMachinesHint: Tap the bookmark icon on any machine to save it for later!
profile.badgesHint: Visit machines and add new ones to earn badges!

deleteAccountConfirm.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. All your data, machines, visits, and badges will be permanently deleted.

deleteAccountSuccess.title: Account Deleted
deleteAccountSuccess.message: Your account has been permanently deleted.

profile.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please contact support at leandrotrabucco@gmail.com

logoutConfirm.title: Log Out
logoutConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to log out?

removeFromSaved.title: Remove from Saved
removeFromSaved.message: Are you sure you want to remove this machine from your saved list?

profile.removeError: Failed to remove machine from saved list.
profile.supportDescription: JidouNavi is built by vending machine lovers who personally visited and photographed these machines. Your support helps us keep the app running and add new features.
profile.supportLinkError: Could not open the support link. Please try again later.

map.searchAccessibilityHint: Enter machine name, description, or address

machine.loginToSave: Please log in to save machines.
machine.loginToCheckIn: Please log in to check in.

checkIn.title: Check In
checkIn.question: Is this vending machine still here?

tooFar.title: Too Far Away
tooFar.message: You need to be closer to the vending machine to check in. Get within 200 meters and try again.

alreadyVisited.title: Already Checked In
alreadyVisited.message: You've already checked in to this machine recently.

success.title: Checked In!
success.stillHere: Thanks for confirming this machine is still here!
success.gone: Thanks for letting us know. We'll verify this machine.

checkIn.locationRequired: Please enable location to check in.

addMachine.title: Add Machine
addMachine.name: Name
addMachine.toggleDevMode: Toggle developer mode for manual location entry

validation.photoRequired: Please take or select a photo.
validation.nameRequired: Please enter a name for the machine.
validation.locationRequired: Please wait for GPS location or enable location services.

addMachine.imageError: Failed to process image. Please try again.
addMachine.submitError: Failed to add machine. Please try again.

share.notAvailable: Sharing is not available on this device
